00230 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t BURTC_IntGetEnabled(void)
00231 {
00232   uint32_t tmp;
00233 
00234   /* Get enabled interrupts */
00235   tmp = BURTC->IEN;
00236 
00237   /* Return set intterupts */
00238   return BURTC->IF & tmp;
00239 }

00279 /***************************************************************************/
00285 __STATIC_INLINE void BURTC_Enable(bool enable)
00286 {
00287   /* Note! If mode is disabled, BURTC counter will not start */
00288   EFM_ASSERT(((enable == true)
00289               && ((BURTC->CTRL & _BURTC_CTRL_MODE_MASK)
00290                   != BURTC_CTRL_MODE_DISABLE))
00291              || (enable == false));
00292   if (enable)
00293   {
00294     BUS_RegBitWrite(&BURTC->CTRL, _BURTC_CTRL_RSTEN_SHIFT, 0);
00295   }
00296   else
00297   {
00298     BUS_RegBitWrite(&BURTC->CTRL, _BURTC_CTRL_RSTEN_SHIFT, 1);
00299   }
00300 }
00301
